GitLab_getProjects.name: GitLab_getProjects
GitLab_getProjects.returns: The details of all the projects available

GitLab_cloneProject.name: GitLab_cloneProject
GitLab_cloneProject.description:
Clones a project from GitLab to the file system.
To use this project the function FileSystem.setWorkingDirectory must be called after with the returned value

parameters.name: projectPathWithNamespace
parameters.description: The full project path in GitLab

projectPathWithNamespace.description: The full project path in GitLab

GitLab_cloneProject.returns: The file system path where the repository is located. You will need to call FileSystem_setWorkingDirectory() with this result to work with the project.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The full project path or numeric id

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the merge request

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the merge request

projectId.description: The full project path or numeric id

title.description: The title of the merge request

description.description: The description of the merge request

GitLab_getMergeRequestLatestPipeline.name: GitLab_getMergeRequestLatestPipeline
GitLab_getMergeRequestLatestPipeline.description: Gets the latest pipeline details from a merge request

parameters.name: gitlabProjectId
parameters.description: The full path or numeric id

parameters.name: mergeRequestIId
parameters.description: The merge request IID. Can be found in the URL to a pipeline

gitlabProjectId.description: The full path or numeric id

mergeRequestIId.description: The merge request IID. Can be found in the URL to a pipeline

GitLab_getPipelineFailedJobLogs.name: GitLab_getPipelineFailedJobLogs
GitLab_getPipelineFailedJobLogs.description: Gets the logs from the jobs which have failed in a pipeline

parameters.name: gitlabProjectId
parameters.description: GitLab project full path or the numeric id

parameters.name: pipelineId
parameters.description: The pipelineId. Can be determined from the URL of a pipeline. https://<gitlab-host>/<group>/[<sub-group>/]<project>/-/pipelines/<pipelineId>

gitlabProjectId.description: GitLab project full path or the numeric id

pipelineId.description: The pipelineId. Can be determined from the URL of a pipeline. https://<gitlab-host>/<group>/[<sub-group>/]<project>/-/pipelines/<pipelineId>

GitLab_getPipelineFailedJobLogs.returns: A Record with the job name as the key and the logs as the value.

GitLab_getMergeRequestPipelineFailedJobL.name: GitLab_getMergeRequestPipelineFailedJobLogs
GitLab_getMergeRequestPipelineFailedJobL.description: Gets the logs from the jobs which have failed in the latest pipeline of a merge request

parameters.name: gitlabProjectId
parameters.description: GitLab project full path or the numeric id

parameters.name: mergeRequestIId
parameters.description: The merge request IID. Can get this from the URL of the merge request. https://<gitlab-host>/<group>/[<sub-group>/]<project>/-/merge_requests/<mergeRequestIId>

gitlabProjectId.description: GitLab project full path or the numeric id

mergeRequestIId.description: The merge request IID. Can get this from the URL of the merge request. https://<gitlab-host>/<group>/[<sub-group>/]<project>/-/merge_requests/<mergeRequestIId>

GitLab_getMergeRequestPipelineFailedJobL.returns: A Record with the job name as the key and the logs as the value.

GitLab_getJobCommitDiff.name: GitLab_getJobCommitDiff
GitLab_getJobCommitDiff.description: Returns the Git diff for the commit in the git repository that the job is running the pipeline on.

parameters.name: projectPath
parameters.description: Full project path or numeric id

projectPath.description: Full project path or numeric id

GitLab_getJobLogs.name: GitLab_getJobLogs
GitLab_getJobLogs.description: Gets the logs for a CI/CD job

parameters.name: projectIdOrProjectPath
parameters.description: GitLab projectId. Either the full path (group(s) and project id) or the numeric id

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job id. Can get this from a job URL in the format https://<gitlab-host>/<group>/[<sub-group>/]<project>/-/jobs/<jobId>

projectIdOrProjectPath.description: GitLab projectId. Either the full path (group(s) and project id) or the numeric id

jobId.description: The job id. Can get this from a job URL in the format https://<gitlab-host>/<group>/[<sub-group>/]<project>/-/jobs/<jobId>

GitLab_getBranches.name: GitLab_getBranches
GitLab_getBranches.description: Gets the list of branches for a given GitLab project.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The full project path (e.g., 'group/subgroup/project') or the numeric project ID.

projectId.description: The full project path (e.g., 'group/subgroup/project') or the numeric project ID.

GitLab_getBranches.returns: A promise that resolves to an array of branch names.

GitLab_getSingleFileContents.name: GitLab_getSingleFileContents
GitLab_getSingleFileContents.description: Retrieves the raw contents of a single file from a GitLab repository using a web UI blob URL.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description:
The GitLab blob URL in the format: https://<host>/<project-path>/-/blob/<ref>/<file-path>
	 *            Example: https://gitlab.internal.company.com/engineering/services/user-service/-/blob/main/src/model/user.ts

url.description:
The GitLab blob URL in the format: https://<host>/<project-path>/-/blob/<ref>/<file-path>
	 *            Example: https://gitlab.internal.company.com/engineering/services/user-service/-/blob/main/src/model/user.ts

GitLab_getSingleFileContents.returns:
The raw file contents as a string
	 *
